long_description: Keep your gear dry and locate contents easily in the PVC-free SealLine Eco-See 5-liter dry bag. Tinted, transparent urethane offers superior water protection, durability and visibility; heavy-duty bottom handles abrasion. Bag closes with Dry Seal(R) roll-down closure featuring durable buckle components; D-ring attachment facilitates retrieval, tie-down and security.
short_description: Keep your gear dry and locate contents easily in the PVC-free SealLine Eco-See 5-liter dry bag.
